text: koyi bhi boojh uthaane waala dosre ka boojh nahi uthaayega, agar koyi gira-baar1 dosre ko apna boojh uthaane ke liye bulaayega to wo us mein se kuch bhi na uthaayega, go qaraabat-daar hee ho, tu sirf unhee ko agaah kar sakta hai jo ghayebana taur par apne rab se darte hai aur namaazo ki paabandi karte hai aur jo bhi paak ho jaaye, wo apne hee nafe ke liye paak hoga, lautna Allah hee ki taraf hai
